file.name: invalid-schema.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: "Refpath spec"
  description: "Refpath spec"
  version: 0.0.1
  contact:
    email: "me@mail.com"
servers:
- url: "/api"
tags:
- name: refpath
paths:
  /refpath:
    $ref: "missing-refpath.yaml"

Error: parse: parse spec: /refpath: referenced pathItem not supported
